Hi, you've reached Drew Johnson's professional webpage. I am currently doing postdoctoral work at ETH Zürich in Switzerland. My area of study is algebraic geometry.

Previously, I was a Paul Olum postdoctoral fellow at the University of Oregon. I received my PhD from the University of Utah, and a BS and MS from Brigham Young University.

Contact

Office: Hauptgebäude (HG) G 27.1

Email: jared.johnson@math.ethz.ch
